item.title: A French Foreign Ministry Official Reads a Sensitive Email Not Initially Addressed to Him
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2025-04-21_1030_0800_read_receipt_by_samuel_belbachir.pdf From: Samuel BELBACHIR (samuel.belbachir@diplomatie.gouv.fr) Subject: Read: Open Letter – Formal Request for Transmission to the Diplomatic Post (Grave Danger Reported) Date sent: April 21, 2025, 10:30 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Vincent B. Le Corre Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2025-04-21_1030_0800_read_receipt_by_samuel_belbachir.pdf The message was read on: 2025-04-21 at 10:30:33 Subject: Open Letter – Formal Request for Transmission to the Diplomatic Post (Grave Danger Reported) To: Pierre Mirochnikoff Sent: 2025-04-19 at 23:06:59
